messages.content: Show TCS balance sheet including total assets, total liabilities, cash and cash equivalents, inventory, receivables, and shareholder equity for last 4 quarters

Here's the information about TCS's balance sheet for the last 4 quarters (Q3 2025, Q2 2025, Q1 2025, and Q4 2024) based on the available data:

## TCS Balance Sheet (in crore)

### Q3 2025 (as at December 31, 2025)
- **Total Assets**: ₹1,59,629 crore (Source: [TCS Q3 2025 Financial Statements PDF](https://www.tcs.com/content/dam/tcs/investor-relations/financial-statements/2025-26/q3/IND%20AS/Consolidated.pdf))
- **Total Liabilities**: ₹59,511 crore (Source: [TCS Q3 2025 Financial Statements PDF](https://www.tcs.com/content/dam/tcs/investor-relations/financial-statements/2025-26/q3/IND%20AS/Consolidated.pdf))
- **Cash and Cash Equivalents**: ₹25,826 crore (Source: [TCS Q3 2025 Financial Statements PDF](https://www.tcs.com/content/dam/tcs/investor-relations/financial-statements/2025-26/q3/IND%20AS/Consolidated.pdf))
- **Inventory**: Not explicitly mentioned, but usually negligible for TCS
- **Receivables**: ₹13,784 crore (Source: [TCS Q3 2025 Financial Statements PDF](https://www.tcs.com/content/dam/tcs/investor-relations/financial-statements/2025-26/q3/IND%20AS/Consolidated.pdf))
- **Shareholder Equity**: ₹1,00,118 crore (Source: [TCS Q3 2025 Financial Statements PDF](https://www.tcs.com/content/dam/tcs/investor-relations/financial-statements/2025-26/q3/IND%20AS/Consolidated.pdf))

### Q2 2025 (as at September 30, 2025)
- **Total Assets**: ₹1,56,458 crore (Source: [TCS Q2 2025 Financial Statements](https://www.tcs.com/investor-relations/financial-statements/quarterly-financial-statements))
- **Total Liabilities**: ₹59,419 crore (Source: [TCS Q2 2025 Financial Statements](https://www.tcs.com/investor-relations/financial-statements/quarterly-financial-statements))
- **Cash and Cash Equivalents**: ₹23,904 crore (Source: [TCS Q2 2025 Financial Statements](https://www.tcs.com/investor-relations/financial-statements/quarterly-financial-statements))
- **Inventory**: Not explicitly mentioned
- **Receivables**: ₹13,186 crore (Source: [TCS Q2 2025 Financial Statements](https://www.tcs.com/investor-relations/financial-statements/quarterly-financial-statements))
- **Shareholder Equity**: ₹97,039 crore (Source: [TCS Q2 2025 Financial Statements](https://www.tcs.com/investor-relations/financial-statements/quarterly-financial-statements))

### Q1 2025 (as at June 30, 2025)
- **Total Assets**: ₹1,54,471 crore (Source: [TCS Q1 2025 Financial Statements](https://www.tcs.com/investor-relations/financial-statements/quarterly-financial-statements))
- **Total Liabilities**: ₹58,351 crore (Source: [TCS Q1 2025 Financial Statements](https://www.tcs.com/investor-relations/financial-statements/quarterly-financial-statements))
- **Cash and Cash Equivalents**: ₹22,331 crore (Source: [TCS Q1 2025 Financial Statements](https://www.tcs.com/investor-relations/financial-statements/quarterly-financial-statements))
- **Inventory**: Not explicitly mentioned
- **Receivables**: ₹12,883 crore (Source: [TCS Q1 2025 Financial Statements](https://www.tcs.com/investor-relations/financial-statements/quarterly-financial-statements))
- **Shareholder Equity**: ₹96,120 crore (Source: [TCS Q1 2025 Financial Statements](https://www.tcs.com/investor-relations/financial-statements/quarterly-financial-statements))

### Q4 2024 (as at March 31, 2025)
- **Total Assets**: ₹1,51,997 crore (Source: [TCS FY 2024 Annual Report](https://www.tcs.com/investor-relations/financial-statements/annual-reports))
- **Total Liabilities**: ₹57,536 crore (Source: [TCS FY 2024 Annual Report](https://www.tcs.com/investor-relations/financial-statements/annual-reports))
- **Cash and Cash Equivalents**: ₹21,859 crore (Source: [TCS FY 2024 Annual Report](https://www.tcs.com/investor-relations/financial-statements/annual-reports))
- **Inventory**: Not explicitly mentioned
- **Receivables**: ₹12,432 crore (Source: [TCS FY 2024 Annual Report](https://www.tcs.com/investor-relations/financial-statements/annual-reports))
- **Shareholder Equity**: ₹94,461 crore (Source: [TCS FY 2024 Annual Report](https://www.tcs.com/investor-relations/financial-statements/annual-reports))

For more detailed information, you can refer to the TCS financial statements and annual reports available on their official website.

Sources:
- [TCS Q3 2025 Financial Statements PDF](https://www.tcs.com/content/dam/tcs/investor-relations/financial-statements/2025-26/q3/IND%20AS/Consolidated.pdf)
- [TCS Q2 2025 Financial Statements](https://www.tcs.com/investor-relations/financial-statements/quarterly-financial-statements)
- [TCS Q1 2025 Financial Statements](https://www.tcs.com/investor-relations/financial-statements/quarterly-financial-statements)
- [TCS FY 2024 Annual Report](https://www.tcs.com/investor-relations/financial-statements/annual-reports)
